title: A Heart for Rebel
description: Twenty-two year old Rebel Walker dreamed of making it out of her sad existence. She wasn't looking for fame or fortune. She was looking for a life full of meaning and comfort. All her life she was keeper to her Mother's depression and playing mother to her baby sister. She wasn't looking for love but someone to help her carry the burden. What she found was so much better. A chance at a fresh start with someone who knew she mattered. Wyatt Verity, owner of a tattoo and piercing shop is the epitome of a bad boy with a heart of gold. He wasn't looking for love, but when his path crossed with Rebel's, he knew his life would for ever change. He wanted not only to possess Rebel's beauty but her heart. Will Rebel accept Wyatt's love or will she throw it away? Can Wyatt convince Rebel to give love a chance?
author: Mia Natal
